sentences.sContent: I would form this crack regiment out of officers alone not a single private .
sentences.sContent_eng: I would form this crack regiment out of officers alone not a single private .
sentences.sCn: 这个顶呱呱的一团，我要完全用军官来组织一个兵也不要。
